channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytipping, 7th December
item.description:
Flytipping on top of willenhall road noticed saturday night.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Elmdene Road, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two large potholes, 7th December
item.description:
Both potholes previously reported but no longer on fix my street. No remedial action taken other than marking area for repair. Markings now wearing off.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chelsfield Road, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog poo all over the pavement, 7th December
item.description:
Yet again someone has let their dog poo all over the pavement and it’s been trodden everywhere. This needs to be cleaned up asap.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brooksbys Walk, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car parked on double yellow line, 7th December
item.description:

item.title: Several very deep potholes, 7th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodland Way, Poverest, Greater London
